data.text:
I suspect that I will stay here again on a return to Barcelona. The hotel has a fabulous position on La Rambla, and is efficiently run, super-friendly, clean and comfortable. Full marks.

I very much liked the free mini bar in the room, and especially the complimentary large bottle of water. The shower was good, there was a good range of bathroom amenities and the towels and robes were of excellent quality. 

The roof terrace was a great place to relax, and drinks were a phone call away.

Things I didn’t like so much included the absence of hair conditioner in the shower; the shampoo-conditioner combination on offer was not that brilliant. Some of the recess lighting under the shower surround in room 502 was coming off. And there was a lack of bedside sockets to plug in devices; there needs to be at least one easily-accessible socket at table height on each side of the bed. I would also avoid the rooms next to the lifts, which make clunking noises whenever they stop at a floor.
data.title: Very good place to stay in Barcelona

data.text: We stayed here for 5 nights in March. It was a perfect location.  We walked almost everywhere. The Gothic quarter, Las Rambles, and the market were at our doorstep.  The staff was so nice and helpful.  The decor and atmosphere was nice and calming.
data.title: Great staff, great location, beautiful hotel.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Carol,
Thanks for this review about your recent stay.

We are delighted to hear that our staff's dedication and friendliness contributed to your enjoyable stay. Their commitment to guest satisfaction is indeed a cornerstone of our service philosophy. 

It's also a pleasure to know that our prime location afforded you the convenience to explore the historic Gothic Quarter and the vibrant Las Ramblas with ease. Our proximity to key attractions is something we are very proud of. 

Your appreciation of the hotel's decor and calming atmosphere is very encouraging. We strive to ensure that Bagués offers a tranquil oasis amidst the buzz of Barcelona, allowing our guests to relax fully after a day of exploration.

We hope that we can welcome you back in the future. 
Kindest regards,

Greg Behn, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Wonderful hotel in a great location. Staff was very friendly, rooms were very nice and they came with a pillow menu! 5/5 and would happily stay here again. Breakfast was wonderful and our eggs were perfectly cooked every day.
data.title: Wonderful stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jason,
Thank you for taking the time to share your review.

We are thrilled to hear that our location served as the perfect base for your adventures in the city. It's wonderful to know that our staff's dedication to service left a lasting impression.

Your appreciation for the room quality and the pillow menu fills us with pride, as we aim to provide a comfortable and memorable stay for all our guests.

Moreover, we're overjoyed that our breakfast offerings, especially the eggs cooked to perfection, contributed to an excellent start to your day.

We are looking forward to welcoming you again. 
All the best,

Greg Behn, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
Location of the hotel is perfect to explore the city.
The hotel and the rooms are beautifully designed. Staff and service are exceptionally friendly, pro-actively helpful and professional.
My room had no desk to work on which was the only improvement I recommended in my review. But a lovely chaise longue to relax.
I will book there again when I come back to Barcelona.
data.title: Perfect location and wonderful service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Franziska,
Thank you very much for your review.

We're thrilled to hear that our central location made it convenient for you to explore the city and that you found the design of our hotel and rooms to be beautiful. 

It's wonderful to know that our staff's friendliness and professionalism made a positive impact on your stay.

We appreciate your feedback regarding the lack of a desk in your room and will take it into consideration for future improvements. 

We're glad, however, that the chaise longue provided a comfortable spot for relaxation.

We hope to see you again in the future. 
Kind regards,

Greg Behn, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Top notch hotel located on Las Rambles. Steps from the Gothic Quarter, shopping, restaurants and attractions. Quaint hotel with old world charm and modern conveniences. Smaller rooms, but well appointed. Very comfortable beds, with superior linens, and pillows. The rooftop pool and deck offers excellent views and a great spot to relax and unwind after a busy day of sight seeing. 5 star property in the heart of Barcelona.
data.title: Barcelona magic

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Heidi,
Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.

It's delightful to hear that you enjoyed the old world charm combined with modern conveniences of our establishment, and found comfort in our superior linens and pillows. We are also thrilled that the rooftop pool and deck with its stunning views added to your enjoyment. Our central location on Las Ramblas indeed offers convenient access to the Gothic Quarter and surrounding attractions, making it an ideal spot for guests looking to explore the heart of Barcelona.

We all hope that we may have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future. 
Best wishes,

Greg Behn, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager
